channel.title: I'm a complete idiot, how does this work?!
channel.description:
Alright, how to I make it so that I can play with other people. I've portforwarded it, I've added no-ip. I've edited all the files to suit me. I've compiled, no errors.
But why is it, that I can only connect to Local Host? This is really annoying!

item.title: I'm a complete idiot, how does this work?!
item.dc:creator: @Goodbye_RS_Hello_RSP Goodbye RS, Hello RSPS
item.description:
@Goodbye_RS_Hello_RSP wrote:

One choice is to use my Server Creator, or find another way to portfoward. Otherwise, use a virtual private server, or dedicated server.

Read full topic
